text: Vincenzo Napoli (born 30 July 1950 in Salerno) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Salerno on 5 June 2016 and took his office on 14 June. ==See also== *2016 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Salerno ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Salerno Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians
title: Vincenzo Napoli (politician)
